instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850 can?t wake up after putting it in sleep mode
threads.message:
Hello, looking for first steps I should look to for this issue.
Laptop doesn?t wake up anymore after it enters sleep mode. Even when I restart it, it will stay stuck in sleep mode.
Unless i disconnect magsafe + charger it will boot again.
This happens with and without battery.
Lost how to tackle this one. It came for ripped trackpad cable replacement. Now it?s back for this issue...
Thanks

threads.title: 820-2850 can?t wake up after putting it in sleep mode
threads.message:
Check SMC_LID signal in that moment.
Also see if the issue persist if you start the machine without trackpad/keyboard connected; use USB ones for test.
Did you try original 85W charger?

threads.title: 820-2850 can?t wake up after putting it in sleep mode
threads.message: I also wonder if C9560 could affect this but I doubt it.

threads.title: 820-2850 can?t wake up after putting it in sleep mode
threads.message: Shouldn't be C9560, but this MUST be changed in any case.
